Date: 2025-06-16 16:57
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

We will be inviting for a weekly call to gather all the updates and highlight any concern or risk, so please ensure attending the calls.

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata 050 8158454/ Khaled Mostafa 050 9706657 any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

 


--------------------------------------------------

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Retail Operations UAE

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Hello Everyone, 

 

Thank you for your weekly time to join our meeting and review all the requirements for the opening of MUFE in YAS mall.

 

@Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  As discussed during out meeting today, could you please share once again the TL valid + ID documents of Frank + POA so that everyone has it as a reference. As well to share with @liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  the tawtheek for the unit so he has it for records and use. From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Subject: RE: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc. For that can we please urgently reconnect all together either tomorrow afternoon starting 1h00 pm or Tuesday so we can discuss in details. For your action please to send the meeting invite and appreciate if everyone can join.

 

Sorry for the inconvenience caused but it is a situation that we cannot control.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Retail Operations UAE

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Retail Operations UAE

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Further to the below communication, please be informed that 14th July marked the last trading day of MUFE Yas Mall, and hoarding was installed after mall trading hours.

 

Kindly see below the latest follow-ups and action points:

 

*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Please confirm if the ADDC inspection for the new location was completed as discussed and share the status of permanent power connection. ‚Äì It was not carried out yesterday, we are waiting for confirmation from the consultant and will advise to all accordingly.
*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Kindly update the status of the fire alarm testing and commissioning. ‚Äì Done internally with the temp power on site, however to interface with the mall we need permanent power.
*	AMCs submission for the new location is completed; @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please update if signature is done.
*	HASSANTUK survey was completed in the new location and the location is approved; @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please keep us posted with exact schedule of HASSANTUK device dismantle in old location and installation in the new boutique. @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please confirm if HASSANTUL relocation payment is done and share the bill with @liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae> .

Hello Everyone,

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted.

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc. For that can we please urgently reconnect all together either tomorrow afternoon starting 1h00 pm or Tuesday so we can discuss in details. For your action please to send the meeting invite and appreciate if everyone can join.

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

As we approach the relocation of Makeup Forever at Yas Mall, we truly appreciate your continued efforts in ensuring all assigned tasks are executed according to the targeted timeline.

 

Please find attached the updated action list, including task owners and respective completion dates, for your reference.

 

Kindly review and ensure timely completion to support a smooth closure of the current boutique and a successful opening of the new one.

 

The weekly call serves as a platform to share progress updates and highlight any potential risks that may affect the relocation. Your attendance is essential, and we kindly request all invitees to participate.

From: Retail Operations UAE
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata 050 8158454/ Khaled Mostafa 050 9706657 any time.

 

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Further to the below communication, please be informed that 14th July marked the last trading day of MUFE Yas Mall, and hoarding was installed after mall trading hours.

 

Kindly see below the latest follow-ups and action points:

 

*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Please confirm if the ADDC inspection for the new location was completed as discussed and share the status of permanent power connection. ‚Äì It was not carried out yesterday, we are waiting for confirmation from the consultant and will advise to all accordingly.
*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Kindly update the status of the fire alarm testing and commissioning. ‚Äì Done internally with the temp power on site, however to interface with the mall we need permanent power.
*	AMCs submission for the new location is completed; @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please update if signature is done.

Hello Everyone,

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted.

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc. For that can we please urgently reconnect all together either tomorrow afternoon starting 1h00 pm or Tuesday so we can discuss in details. For your action please to send the meeting invite and appreciate if everyone can join.

From: Retail Operations UAE
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Further to the below communication, please be informed that 14th July marked the last trading day of MUFE Yas Mall, and hoarding was installed after mall trading hours.

 

Kindly see below the latest follow-ups and action points:

 

*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Please confirm if the ADDC inspection for the new location was completed as discussed and share the status of permanent power connection. ‚Äì It was not carried out yesterday, we are waiting for confirmation from the consultant and will advise to all accordingly.
*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Kindly update the status of the fire alarm testing and commissioning. ‚Äì Done internally with the temp power on site, however to interface with the mall we need permanent power.
*	AMCs submission for the new location is completed; @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please update if signature is done.
*	HASSANTUK survey was completed in the new location and the location is approved; @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please keep us posted with exact schedule of HASSANTUK device dismantle in old location and installation in the new boutique. @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please confirm if HASSANTUL relocation payment is done and share the bill with @liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae> .

Hello Everyone,

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted.

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc. For that can we please urgently reconnect all together either tomorrow afternoon starting 1h00 pm or Tuesday so we can discuss in details. For your action please to send the meeting invite and appreciate if everyone can join.

From: Retail Operations UAE
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Retail Operations UAE

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Further to the below communication, please be informed that 14th July marked the last trading day of MUFE Yas Mall, and hoarding was installed after mall trading hours.

 

Kindly see below the latest follow-ups and action points:

 

*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Please confirm if the ADDC inspection for the new location was completed as discussed and share the status of permanent power connection. ‚Äì It was not carried out yesterday, we are waiting for confirmation from the consultant and will advise to all accordingly. 
*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Kindly update the status of the fire alarm testing and commissioning. ‚Äì Done internally with the temp power on site, however to interface with the mall we need permanent power. 
*	AMCs submission for the new location is completed; @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please update if signature is done.
*	HASSANTUK survey was completed in the new location and the location is approved; @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please keep us posted with exact schedule of HASSANTUK device dismantle in old location and installation in the new boutique. @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please confirm if HASSANTUL relocation payment is done and share the bill with @liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae> .

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

As we approach the relocation of Makeup Forever at Yas Mall, we truly appreciate your continued efforts in ensuring all assigned tasks are executed according to the targeted timeline.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Best regards,

Retail Operations UAE

Hello Everyone, 

 

URGENT UPDATE

 

Please note, we are facing a power shutdown at our unit currently under construction and it is completely out of our control which has impacted our progress on site. This situation is on-going since Thursday after trading hours till present. I will be at YAS Mall tomorrow morning to discuss the same with the mall as they are involved directly in this topic to try and find an urgent solution. I keep you posted. 

 

Having said the above and since we have already lost 4 days of works, we are obliged to revise the dates of the closure and handover as following:

 

*	Closure date of the current operational boutique will be on the 14th after trading hours instead of 9th July after trading hours so that we can still trade and reduce loss of sales.
*	Handover of new boutique from GC to operations team to be on 15th morning. (TBC based on my meetings tomorrow)

 

@Mohamed BATA <mailto:Mohamed.Bata@chalhoub.com>  accordingly we have to review and revise all the locked dates related to the activities that were scheduled in between such as deep cleaning, stock transfer, logistics etc etc.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Monday, 16 June 2025 5:00 PM
Subject: Makeup Forever Yas Mall Boutique Relocation
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Please be informed that Makeup Forever Yas Mall current boutique will be closed and relocated to the ground floor.

 

The last trading date of the current boutique will be on Wednesday 9th July at 10:00 PM and the hoarding installation will commence after mall trading hours.

 

The boutique will be surrendered to the mall in AS IS CONDITION however all clearance certificates (HASSANTUK & ADDC) must be submitted on/before 19th July 2025.

 

The new boutique opening will be on 19th July 2025 and will operate using same store code with no change.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure/Opening checklist (Attached) for these two stores to ensure completion of all tasks on time.

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

Further to the below communication, please be informed that 14th July marked the last trading day of MUFE Yas Mall, and hoarding was installed after mall trading hours.

 

Kindly see below the latest follow-ups and action points:

 

*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Please confirm if the ADDC inspection for the new location was completed as discussed and share the status of permanent power connection. ‚Äì It was not carried out yesterday, we are waiting for confirmation from the consultant and will advise to all accordingly. 
*	@liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae>  ‚Äì Kindly update the status of the fire alarm testing and commissioning. ‚Äì Done internally with the temp power on site, however to interface with the mall we need permanent power. 
*	AMCs submission for the new location is completed; @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please update if signature is done.
*	HASSANTUK survey was completed in the new location and the location is approved; @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please keep us posted with exact schedule of HASSANTUK device dismantle in old location and installation in the new boutique. @Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  Please confirm if HASSANTUL relocation payment is done and share the bill with @liyakhat.ali <mailto:liyakhat.ali@rrbc.ae> .
